skos:Concept.skos:scopeNote: EFFICIENCY OF PRODUCTION AT THE LEVEL OF THE INDIVIDUAL, THE ENTERPRISE OR THE SPECIFIC ECONOMIC SECTOR.

THE INTEGRATION OF AGRICULTURAL PRODUCTION, PROCESSING AND MARKETING UNDER A SINGLE COMPREHENSIVE MANAGEMENT.

A PROCESS OF ENLARGING PEOPLE'S CHOICES: FOCUSES ON BOTH THE FORMATION OF HUMAN CAPABILITIES - IMPROVED HEALTH, KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS - AND THE USE PEOPLE MAKE OF THEIR ACQUIRED CAPABILITIES, FOR WORK OR LEISURE.
RELATIONS AMONG DEVELOPING COUNTRIES.

INCLUDES DRUGS, TOILETRIES AND COSMETICS TECHNOLOGY.

INCLUDES COOPERATIVE MEASURES IN BANKING, TRADE, INDUSTRY ETC., BETWEEN AND AMONG COUNTRIES.
A SECTOR OF FORESTRY THAT DEALS WITH THE DEVELOPMENT, REPRODUCTION AND CARE OF FOREST TREES.
BROAD STEPS OF FORMAL EDUCATIONAL PROGRESSIONS FROM ELEMENTARY TO MORE COMPLICATED EXPERIENCE. USED AS A CLASSIFICATION IN EDUCATIONAL ORGANIZATION AND STATISTICS.
FROM AGE FIVE TO ELEVEN.
REFERS TO THE EDUCATION OF MIGRANT WORKERS AND THEIR FAMILIES.
STUDENTS NOT NATIVE TO A PARTICULAR COUNTRY.

skos:Concept.skos:scopeNote: USE IN CONNECTION WITH PAID OR UNPAID LEAVE GRANTED TO EMPLOYEES FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES.
INCLUDES WAVE EQUATIONS AND FUNCTIONS.
CENTRES WHERE PRESCHOOL CHILDREN MAY BE LEFT TO BE CARED FOR, WHILE THE PARENTS ARE AT WORK OR STUDY; MAY INCLUDE HEALTH AND FAMILY SERVICES.
19TH-20TH CENTURY.
RECOGNIZED LIST OF FUNCTIONS AND TASKS INCLUDED IN A PARTICULAR JOB.
USE WHEN REFERRING TO REGIONS WITHIN A COUNTRY.

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: ESTUDIO DE LOS USUARIOS DE INFORMACIÓN

skos:Concept.skos:scopeNote: NATURE AND ORIGIN OF THE UNIVERSE.
DISPERSION OR DISTRIBUTION OF FUNCTIONS AND POWERS FROM A CENTRAL AUTHORITY TO A LOCAL AUTHORITY OR COMMUNITY.
CONDITIONS, CIRCUMSTANCES OR REQUIREMENTS GOVERNING ADMITTANCE TO EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS OR PROGRAMMES.
SPECIALLY ORGANIZED TRAINING, GIVEN OUTSIDE OF PRODUCTION ACTIVITIES OF AN UNDERTAKING, AND AIMED AT IMPARTING THE BASIC KNOWLEDGE AND SKILL REQUIRED FOR A GIVEN GROUP OF OCCUPATIONS.
REQUIRED CONDITIONS, USUALLY ACADEMIC, FOR A POST.
COMPREHENSION OF THE CAPABILITIES AND APPLICATIONS OF COMPUTERS; MAY INCLUDE THE ABILITY TO USE COMPUTERS TO SOLVE PROBLEMS.
ORGANIZED CENTRES FOR TEACHERS TO MEET, DISCUSS, FIND RESOURCES AND DEVELOP MATERIALS.
EDUCATION IMPARTED AT A DISTANCE THROUGH COMMUNICATION MEDIA: RADIO, TV, THE TELEPHONE, CORRESPONDENCE OR VIDEO.
GROUPINGS OF COUNTRIES FOR ECONOMIC, POLITICAL, OR MILITARY PURPOSES.
THE APPLICATION OF PSYCHOLOGY TO THE WORK ENVIRONMENT AND PERSONNEL MANAGEMENT.
EDUCATION AIMED AT INTERNATIONAL UNDERSTANDING, COOPERATION, PEACE, HUMAN RIGHTS AND FUNDAMENTAL FREEDOMS. DO NOT CONFUSE WITH EDUCATION IN INTERNATIONAL SCHOOLS.
MUSIC DISTINCTIVE OF A CERTAIN REGION OR ETHNIC GROUP.
GLOBAL TERM FOR TRAINING SUBSEQUENT AND COMPLEMENTARY TO INITIAL TRAINING.

THE RATIO OF EXPORT TO IMPORT PRICES OF THE PRODUCTS INVOLVED IN A GIVEN COUNTRY OR REGION'S INTERNATIONAL TRADE. MAY ALSO BE USED BY EXTENSION WITH RESPECT TO TRADE BETWEEN AREAS WITHIN A COUNTRY, SUCH AS URBAN OR RURAL AREAS.
USE FOR EVENTS AFTER 1991.
USE FOR EVENTS BEFORE 1991.

COVERS ATYPICAL STUDENTS OF ANY KIND.

ANY CHANGE IN THE GENOTYPE OF AN ORGANISM OCCURRING AT THE GENE, CHROMOSOME OR GENOME LEVEL.
THE OPTIMAL ADAPTATION OF THE WORK ENVIRONMENT TO HUMAN NEEDS.
TECHNIQUES USED IN THE CLASSROOM OR IN ANY OTHER EDUCATIONAL SETTING TO CREATE PROPITIOUS LEARNING CONDITIONS; INCLUDES DISCIPLINE, MANAGEMENT, SITTING ARRANGEMENT.

THE MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS FOR A DECENT STANDARD OF LIFE: ADEQUATE FOOD, SHELTER, CLOTHING, COMMUNITY SERVICES. THEY ALSO INCLUDE NEEDS RELATING TO HUMAN RIGHTS, PUBLIC PARTICIPATION IN DECISION-MAKING, PRODUCTIVE EMPLOYMENT.
A GENETICALLY DETERMINED CHARACTERISTIC THAT ENHANCES THE ABILITY OF AN ORGANISM TO COPE WITH ITS ENVIRONMENT.

OUTLINE OF PROCEDURES, COURSES AND SUBJECTS TO BE PROVIDED BY AN EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION OVER A GIVEN PERIOD OF TIME.
THE ACTUAL WORKFORCE -MANPOWER-, PLUS THE POTENTIAL WORKFORCE.
THE PROCESS BY WHICH REPRESENTATIVES OF EMPLOYERS AND EMPLOYEES DISCUSS AND NEGOTIATE THE VARIOUS PHASES OF THEIR RELATIONSHIP WITH A VIEW TO ARRIVING AT A MUTUALLY ACCEPTABLE LABOUR AGREEMENT.
AT THE LEVEL OF EDUCATIONAL SYSTEMS.
FOR DISABLED STUDENTS.
CHANGE PLANNED OR IN PROCESS OF IMPLEMENTATION TO A MAJOR PART OF A NATIONAL SYSTEM OF EDUCATION.
OPTIONAL OR COMPULSORY PART OF A PROGRAMME OF STUDIES WHERE CREDIT IS GIVEN FOR WORK OFF-CAMPUS IN SOCIAL OR DEVELOPMENT SERVICES, LOCAL GOVERNMENT, AND INDUSTRIAL OR OTHER ORGANIZATIONS.
USE FOR THE CONDITIONS OF EMPLOYMENT STIPULATED IN THE STAFF REGULATIONS OF AN ENTERPRISE OR ORGANIZATION, OR IN A COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT NEGOTIATED BY EMPLOYER'S AND WORKERS' REPRESENTATIVES.
INCLUDES MESSAGE CREATION, ELECTRONIC MAIL AND ELECTRONIC FILING.

EMPLOYMENT RANK, POSITION OR STATUS ACHIEVED BY AN INDIVIDUAL OR GROUP.

AN ANNUAL 'VOLUME' OF CURRENT INFORMATION IN DESCRIPTIVE AND/OR STATISTICAL FORM, SOMETIMES LIMITED TO A SPECIAL FIELD.
STUDYING DONE AT HOME OUTSIDE SCHOOL HOURS, INCLUDING WORK ON SCHOOL ASSIGNMENTS, COMMUNITY PROJECTS, OR INDIVIDUAL PROBLEMS.

CRITERIA ESTABLISHED BY AN EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION TO DETERMINE LEVELS OF STUDENT ACHIEVEMENT.
PROCESS BY WHICH ONE DEVELOPS ABILITIES, ATTITUDES AND OTHER FORMS OF BEHAVIOUR CONSIDERED TO HAVE VALUE IN THE SOCIETY IN WHICH ONE LIVES. USE MORE SPECIFIC DESCRIPTOR.
PREMATURE SCHOOL LEAVING BEFORE COMPLETING A CYCLE OR COURSE ALREADY BEGUN.
DO NOT CONFUSE WITH "FAMILY EDUCATION".
USE FOR EVENTS AFTER 1991.
USE TO MEAN THE MANAGEMENT OF EDUCATIONAL ESTABLISHMENTS.
A GROUP OF WORKERS, PERFORMING SIMILAR WORK AND TRAINED TO IDENTIFY AND SOLVE PROBLEMS, WHO VOLUNTEER TO MAKE RECOMMENDATIONS RELATING TO THE IMPROVEMENT OF PRODUCTIVITY, QUALITY, WORK MORALE, ETC.
A CULTURE THAT PROMOTES LIFEWAYS, PATTERNS OF BELIEF, VALUES AND BEHAVIOUR THAT FOSTER PEACE-BUILDING AND ACCOMPANYING INSTITUTIONAL ARRANGEMENTS.
CULTURE PECULIAR TO A SOCIAL GROUP OR CATEGORY.
USE MORE SPECIFIC DESCRIPTOR.
USE WITH RESPECT TO LEGAL ISSUES SUCH AS ACCESS TO THE SEA AND RIGHT TO PARTICIPATE IN THE EXPLOITATION OF MARINE RESOURCES.
USE MORE SPECIFIC DESCRIPTOR.
REFERS TO REGIONS WITHIN A COUNTRY.
DESIGNED TO CATCH UP WITH A LAG IN A GIVEN SUBJECT OR FIELD.
ACTION TO BRING HOSTILE PARTIES TO AGREEMENT THROUGH MEANS FORESEEN IN CHAPTER VI OF THE UN CHARTER CONCERNING THE PEACEFUL SETTLEMENT OF DISPUTES.
CAPABILITY OF A DEVICE TO PERFORM FUNCTIONS NORMALLY ASSOCIATED WITH HUMAN INTELLIGENCE.
DEVICES THAT MECHANICALLY, ELECTRICALLY, AND/OR ELECTRONICALLY PRESENT INSTRUCTIONAL PROGRAMMES AT A RATE CONTROLLED BY THE LEARNERS' RESPONSES.
REFERS TO ETHNIC GROUPS; COVERS ALSO NEGATIVE ASPECT OF SEGREGATION.
RELATING TO PART OR THE WHOLE OF THE EDUCATIONAL SYSTEM.
PLANNING OF MANPOWER PROVISION.
COMPANIES OPERATING IN A NUMBER OF COUNTRIES BUT WITH SERVICE AND EVEN PRODUCTION FACILITIES FREQUENTLY LOCATED OUTSIDE THOSE COUNTRIES.

REFERS ONLY TO BILATERAL RELATIONS BETWEEN COUNTRIES.
INCLUDES BOTH VOLUNTARY AND ASSESSED CONTRIBUTIONS.

GIVING ADVICE, INFORMATION OR ENCOURAGEMENT TO PEOPLE IN NEED.
REFERS TO THE UNOFFICIAL, OR NON-REGISTERED AND UNTAXED, THEREFORE INFORMAL, SECTOR OF THE ECONOMY.
THE STANDING OF AN INDIVIDUAL OR A GROUP BEFORE THE LAW WHICH DETERMINES RIGHTS AND DUTIES.

PROCESS OF CHECKING INDUSTRIAL PRODUCTS AT VARIOUS STAGES OF MANUFACTURE TO ENSURE THAT THEY CONFORM TO SET STANDARDS.
THE GENERATION OF NEW JOBS IN SECTORS OR ENTERPRISES REQUIRING MORE MANPOWER.
RIGHTS OF PERFORMERS, PRODUCERS OF PHONOGRAMS, AND BROADCASTING ORGANIZATIONS.

COLLECTIVE RELATIONS BETWEEN EMPLOYERS AND EMPLOYEES, BETWEEN EMPLOYERS AND TRADE UNIONS, OR BETWEEN EMPLOYERS, UNIONS AND THE GOVERNMENT. USE "PERSONNEL MANAGEMENT" FOR INDIVIDUAL RELATIONS BETWEEN EMPLOYERS AND EMPLOYEES.
THE USE OF COMPUTERS FOR INSTRUCTION, TESTING, STUDENT/PUPIL PERSONNEL SERVICES, SCHOOL ADMINISTRATIVE SUPPORT SERVICES, ETC. USE MORE SPECIFIC DESCRIPTOR WHERE APPROPRIATE.
SYSTEMATIC PROCESS OF PRODUCING NEW CURRICULA OR IMPROVING EXISTING ONES;
ORGANIZED ACTIVITIES INTENDED TO HELP INDIVIDUALS OR GROUPS USE NON-WORK TIME IN A MANNER CONDUCIVE TO PHYSICAL AND MENTAL WELL-BEING.
ACCESS TO NEW TECHNOLOGY, BOTH PRODUCTS AND PRODUCTION TECHNIQUES, AS A KEY FACTOR IN THE ECONOMIC GROWTH OF DEVELOPING COUNTRIES.

ACTION LINKED WITH THE DEPLOYMENT OF UN MILITARY AND/OR POLICE PERSONNEL IN AREAS OF INSTABILITY, WITH THE CONSENT OF ALL THE PARTIES CONCERNED.

VERBAL AND NONVERBAL COMMUNICATION AMONG PEOPLE OF DIFFERENT CULTURES.

MANUALS FOR TEACHERS OFTEN ACCOMPANYING TEXTBOOKS.

A PERSON WHO WORKS ON THE THEORY OR APPLICATION OF INFORMATICS OR INFORMATION SCIENCE, I.E. ANALYSES, DESIGNS, IMPLEMENTS ETC. INFORMATION SYSTEMS.
COOPERATION FOR DEVELOPMENT IN ANY ECONOMIC, SOCIAL OR TECHNICAL FIELD AT THE SUPRANATIONAL LEVEL.
ENABLING PROCESS THROUGH WHICH CHILDREN AND ADULTS RECEIVE A SENSE OF IDENTIFICATION WITH THEIR COMMUNITY.
BETWEEN LEVELS OF EDUCATION OR TYPES OF SCHOOL. -IBE USES: ARTICULATION-
INCLUDES PHILOSOPHY OF NATURE, PHILOSOPHY OF LIFE, INFINITY, ETC.
RELIANCE PRIMARILY ON A COUNTRY'S OWN HUMAN AND NATURAL RESOURCES AND THE CAPACITY FOR AUTONOMOUS GOAL-SETTING AND DECISION-MAKING.
THE STUDY OF THE WATERS OF THE EARTH, THEIR CIRCULATION, DISTRIBUTION AND PROPERTIES.
SHORT COURSE USUALLY HELD AT A UNIVERSITY OR COLLEGE DURING THE SUMMER VACATION.
GOVERNMENT AUSTERITY MEASURES DIRECTED TOWARDS ALTERING THE STRUCTURE OF THE ECONOMY.
CAUSED BY CHANGES IN THE STRUCTURE OF THE ECONOMY RESULTING FROM SUCH FACTORS AS TECHNOLOGICAL CHANGE OR RELOCATION OF INDUSTRY, OR BY CHANGES IN THE COMPOSITION OF THE LABOUR FORCE.
17-19TH CENTURY.
USE FOR EVENTS BEFORE MAY 1997; OTHERWISE, USE CONGO DR.
TEMPORARY USE OF AGRICULTURAL LAND FOR CULTIVATION AS LONG AS IT IS FERTILE.
A 'VOCABULARY' NOT NECESSARILY IN ALPHABETIC ORDER, WITH DEFINITIONS OR EXPLANATIONS FOR ALL TERMS.
HIGHER EDUCATION INSTITUTIONS WITH OPEN ADMISSION POLICIES THAT OFFER EXTERNAL DEGREE PROGRAMMMES AND OFTEN MAKE USE OF DISTANCE EDUCATION.
TRAINING AIMING AT PROVIDING THE SKILLS, KNOWLEDGE AND ATTITUDES REQUIRED FOR EMPLOYMENT IN A PARTICULAR OCCUPATION, OR GROUP OF RELATED OCCUPATIONS, IN ANY FIELD OF ECONOMIC ACTIVITY.
EDUCATION IN NURSERY SCHOOLS OR KINDERGARTEN UP TO THE AGE OF FIVE.
USE ONLY IN CONNECTION WITH RESEARCH AND PLANNING.
HARMFUL EFFECTS OF OCCUPATIONAL ACTIVITIES AND WORK ENVIRONMENT ON WORKERS' HEALTH.
HISTORICAL RECONSTITUTION OF THE PHYSICAL GEOGRAPHY OF PAST AGES.
USE FOR EVENTS AFTER 1991.
EDUCATION ON THE ISSUES OF CONCERN IN THE DEVELOPMENT PROCESS ADDRESSED TO YOUTH AND ADULTS IN DEVELOPED COUNTRIES.
USE MORE SPECIFIC DESCRIPTOR.
-IBE USES: SECONDARY SCHOOL LEAVERS-
RESEARCH DIRECTED TOWARDS THE DEVELOPMENT OF NEW PRODUCTS AND PROCESSES.
SERIES OF PLANNED ACTIVITIES, WITH ADMINISTRATIVE CONNOTATION, RELATING TO DEVELOPMENT OF INSTITUTIONS. DO NOT CONFUSE WITH "INSTRUCTIONAL PROGRAMMES".
'DATA TRANSFORMATION' OR REPRESENTATION APPLYING A 'CODE'.
COMPUTER SOFTWARE AND ACCOMPANYING DOCUMENTATION WRITTEN FOR EDUCATIONAL APPLICATIONS.
LEARNING BY DOING.
THE SYSTEMATIC APPRAISAL OF MANAGEMENT METHODS BY TEAMS FROM EITHER THE ORGANIZATION OR OUTSIDE.
INSTITUTIONS, PROGRAMMES AND ACTIVITIES FOR OUT OF SCHOOL YOUTH AND EXTRA-CURRICULAR ACTIVITIES FOR THOSE IN SCHOOL.
RELATIVE IMPORTANCE OF THE VARIOUS SECTORS OF THE ECONOMY.
ALL TYPES OF ACTIVITIES TENDING TO ENHANCE CULTURAL LIFE THROUGH CULTURAL ANIMATION AND CULTURAL VALUES PROMOTION. USE MORE SPECIFIC DESCRIPTOR WHERE APPROPRIATE.
STANDARDS CONCERNING EMPLOYMENT AND WORKING CONDITIONS SET OUT IN COLLECTIVE AGREEMENTS BETWEEN EMPLOYERS AND WORKERS OR IN LABOUR LAWS AND REGULATIONS ADOPTED BY THE LEGISLATURE.
A LIBRARY PRIMARILY SERVING ONE DISCIPLINE OR PARTICULAR FIELD.
PATTERN OF INTELLECTUAL AND SOCIAL BEHAVIOUR BASED ON SCIENTIFIC KNOWLEDGE.
ARRANGEMENT INTO AN ORGANIC WHOLE OF THE INTERDEPENDENT INSTITUTIONS AND PROGRAMMES PROVIDING FORMAL AND NONFORMAL EDUCATION. -IBE USES: EDUCATIONAL ORGANIZATION-
USE MORE SPECIFIC DESCRIPTOR WHERE APPROPRIATE.
EFFORTS TENDING TO DEVELOP CULTURE IN THE BROADEST MEANING OF THE TERM, WITH REFERENCE TO COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT, FREEDOM OF EXPRESSION AND FREE CHOICE OF LIFE STYLE.
USE FOR EVENTS BEFORE 1991.
USE TO MEAN THE SUBJECTS TAUGHT, THE TIME ALLOTTED TO EACH, AND THE SEQUENCE.
ELEMENTS COMBINED IN MINUTE QUANTITIES IN PLANT OR ANIMAL TISSUES CONSIDERED ESSENTIAL IN PHYSIOLOGICAL PROCESSES.
CONDUCTING CONFERENCES SIMULTANEOUSLY AT DISPERSED LOCATIONS USING VIDEO,
UTILIZATION OF BIOLOGICAL ORGANISMS, PROCESSES AND SYSTEMS TO MAKE OR MODIFY PRODUCTS, TO IMPROVE PLANTS OR ANIMALS, OR TO DEVELOP MICROORGANISMS FOR SPECIFIC USES.
COMPARATIVE STUDY OF CURRENT EDUCATIONAL THEORY AND PRACTICE IN DIFFERENT COUNTRIES.
THE COORDINATED PACKAGE OF PROGRAMMES AND PROJECTS DICTATED BY DEVELOPMENT POLICY, WHICH AIMS TO ACHIEVE A PARTICULAR KIND OF DEVELOPMENT.
TRANSFER OF SKILLS AND PROVISION OF ADVICE TO DEVELOPING COUNTRIES IN VARIOUS FIELDS: ADMINISTRATIVE, SCIENTIFIC, PROFESSIONAL, AND TECHNICAL.
USE MORE SPECIFIC DESCRIPTOR WHERE APPROPRIATE.
INCLUDES TRAINING FOR FARMERS IN MORE EFFICIENT PRACTICES, PLANNING AND MANAGEMENT SKILLS, LOW-INTEREST CREDIT, SIMPLE IRRIGATION, SUBSIDIZED FERTILIZER AND POST-HARVEST FACILITIES, ETC.
AVAILABILITY OF EDUCATIONAL PROVISION.
THEY IDENTIFY AND PREPARE A PRELIMINARY DESIGN OF THE TECHNICAL AND INSTITUTIONAL ALTERNATIVES THAT MAY EXIST FOR A PROPOSED PROJECT.
CONTINUING INCREASE OF ELDERLY POPULATION BOTH IN ABSOLUTE AND IN PROPORTIONAL TERMS IN A GIVEN SOCIETY.
REGIONS, LOCALITIES, ETC., IN NEED OF SPECIAL EDUCATIONAL ACTION.
USE FOR THE STUDY OF RELATIONSHIPS BETWEEN LIVING ORGANISMS AND THEIR NATURAL ENVIRONMENT.
A COLLECTION OF WORKS OF VARIOUS AUTHORS OR OF ONE AUTHOR SELECTED FOR A SPECIFIC PURPOSE OR UNDER SPECIFIC ASPECTS.
DEVELOPMENT OF AN INTEGRATED METHOD FOR PRODUCING A REQUIRED ARTICLE OR PERFORMING A DESIRED OPERATION.
USE FOR EVENTS BEFORE 1 JULY 1997. OTHERWISE, USE HONG KONG, CHINA.
USE FOR WORKS DEALING WITH RESEARCH PROJECTS. FOR GENERAL SCIENTIFIC WORKS, USE "OCEANOGRAPHY".

THEORY AND PRACTICE OF INTERNATIONAL PLANNING AND AGREEMENTS BY WHICH COUNTRIES SPECIALIZE IN THE PRODUCTION OF THOSE COMMODITIES FOR WHICH THEY HAVE THE GREATEST COMPARATIVE ADVANTAGE. DO NOT CONFUSE WITH "DIVISION OF LABOUR".

STATISTICAL METHODS APPLIED TO BIOLOGICAL PROBLEMS.
PROVIDED BY SPECIALIST MISSIONS TO COUNTRIES UNDER INTERNATIONAL PROGRAMMES. -IBE USES: EDUCATIONAL MISSIONS-

ILLUSTRATIVE OF THE EVOLUTION OF HUMAN SOCIETY AND SETTLEMENT OVER TIME, UNDER THE INFLUENCE OF THE PHYSICAL CONSTRAINTS/OPPORTUNITIES OF THE NATURAL ENVIRONMENT AND OF SUCCESSIVE SOCIAL, ECONOMIC AND CULTURAL FORCES.

FROM BIRTH TO ADOLESCENCE.

POLICY OF ENSURING EQUALITY OF EDUCATIONAL OPPORTUNITY IN ORDER TO ACHIEVE UNIVERSAL EDUCATION.
PROCESS OF DEVELOPMENT OR PROGRESS IN THE CULTURAL LIFE OF A COMMUNITY.
A TEACHER'S OUTLINE OF WHAT HE HOPES TO ACCOMPLISH WITH THE STUDENTS DURING A PARTICULAR LESSON. IT MAY LIST AIMS, MAIN TEACHING POINTS, MEDIA AND RESOURCES, TEACHING AND EVALUATION METHODS, ETC.
TECHNICAL AND MANAGERIAL EXPERTISE NECESSARY TO IMPLEMENT A TECHNOLOGY.
ENERGY FROM THE CONVERSION OF AGRICULTURAL AND FOREST RESIDUES, STANDING VEGETATION, ENERGY CROPS, AND WASTES.
A BROADER CONCEPT THAN PRIMARY SCHOOLING, COMPRISING EARLY CHILD EDUCATION, ADULT LITERACY PROGRAMMES, AND A RANGE OF NONFORMAL ACTIVITIES FOR CHILDREN, YOUNG PEOPLE AND ADULTS.
CONVERSION OF POLICY GOALS INTO OPERATIONAL TERMS, INCLUDING SOME INDICATION OF ALTERNATIVE PATHS TO REACH THESE GOALS.

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: LANGUE D'ASIE DU SUD ET DU SUD-EST
LENGUA DE SUR Y SURESTE DE ASIA

skos:Concept.skos:scopeNote: THAT PART OF THE STUDY OF ECONOMICS DEVOTED TO THE BEHAVIOUR OF PEOPLE, GOVERNMENTS, AND ORGANIZATIONS IN SPECIFIC MARKETS.
ANY SCIENCE THAT STUDIES HUMAN AND ANIMAL BEHAVIOUR IN ITS PHYSICAL AND SOCIAL ENVIRONMENT BY EXPERIMENTAL AND OBSERVATIONAL METHODS.
RESEARCH DESIGNED FOR THE SOLUTION OF A SPECIFIC PROBLEM.
MATERIALS DESIGNED SO THAT LEARNERS CAN LEARN FROM THEM WITHOUT MUCH HELP FROM A TEACHER: THEY ARE PRE-RECORDED, STORED TEACHING.
A LARGE-SCALE UNDERTAKING AIMED AT DISSEMINATING INFORMATION TO OR INFLUENCE THE OPINION OF THE GENERAL PUBLIC; MAY ALSO BE USED IN RELATION TO THE PROPAGATION OF POPULAR CULTURE.

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: FORMACIÓN EN CIENCIAS DE LA INFORMACIÓN

skos:Concept.skos:scopeNote: A PRINTED LIST OF DOCUMENTS CONTAINING FORMAL DESCRIPTIONS OF THE DOCUMENTS.
INCLUDES ALL LEVELS.
COEXISTENCE WITHIN SOCIETY OF CULTURALLY DIFFERENTIATED GROUPS WHICH MAINTAIN SEPARATE WAYS OF LIFE.
NUMERICAL DATA USED TO ASSESS VARIOUS ASPECTS OF EDUCATION.
EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMMES TO INCREASE MANAGERIAL AND SUPERVISORY SKILLS OF MANAGERS AND MANAGEMENT TRAINEES.
USE FOR EVENTS BEFORE 1991.
A 'LIBRARY' WHICH IS RESPONSIBLE FOR ACQUIRING AND CONSERVING COPIES OF ALL SIGNIFICANT PUBLICATIONS PUBLISHED IN THE COUNTRY AND MAY FUNCTION AS A 'LEGAL DEPOSIT LIBRARY'.
ORGANIZED AND LEGALLY BOUND SOCIAL LIFE THAT IS VOLUNTARY AND AUTONOMOUS FROM THE STATE, SUCH AS NONGOVERNMENTAL ORGANIZATIONS, ASSOCIATIONS AND GRASSROOT MOVEMENTS.
NON FEE-PAYING EDUCATION.
USE FOR EVENTS AFTER NOVEMBER 1993. OTHERWISE, USE 'EEC COUNTRIES'.
CLASSIFICATION OF THE SPECIES OF PLANTS.
RELATIVELY GREATER LABOUR COSTS THAN PLANT AND EQUIPMENT COSTS.
A 'LIBRARY' RECEIVING BY LAW OR UNDER ARRANGEMENTS FREE COPIES OF ALL OR ALL REQUIRED NATIONAL PUBLICATIONS.
USE ONLY IN A SUBNATIONAL CONTEXT.
USE MORE SPECIFIC DESCRIPTOR WHERE APPROPRIATE.
A SOCIETY'S SOCIAL, ARTISTIC AND INTELLECTUAL INHERITANCE FROM THE PAST, BOTH TANGIBLE AND INTANGIBLE. USE MORE SPECIFIC DESCRIPTOR WHERE APPROPRIATE.
CONSUMER DEMAND FOR EDUCATION.
A SURVEY OF PROGRESS IN A PARTICULAR FIELD OF SCIENCE OVER A GIVEN PERIOD.
PERSONS WHO DIRECT THE PRACTICE OF SKILLS TOWARD IMMEDIATE IMPROVEMENT IN SOME ART OR TASK.
REFERS TO THE CONSERVATION, PRESERVATION AND RESTORATION OF CULTURAL PROPERTY, AS WELL AS TO ITS PROTECTION AGAINST VANDALISM, THEFT AND REMOVAL FROM COUNTRY OF ORIGIN.
USE FOR EVENTS BEFORE 1918.
THAT AREA OF GENERAL ADMINISTRATIVE MANAGEMENT CONCERNED WITH ACHIEVING ECONOMY AND EFFICIENCY IN THE CREATION, USE AND MAINTENANCE, AND DISPOSITION OF RECORDS.
EMPLOYMENT ON A REGULAR BASIS FOR HOURS SUBSTANTIALLY SHORTER THAN THE STANDARD HOURS.
PROVIDE GRANTS OR FUNDS TO FINANCE RESEARCH, SERVICES, FACILITIES, EQUIPMENT.
DESIGNED TO ENABLE TEACHERS TO BE RETRAINED, OR TO OBTAIN A HIGHER LEVEL CERTIFICATE, OR EVEN TO BE INITIALLY TRAINED WHEN ALREADY IN THE FIELD.
PLANNING FURTHER PROVISIONS OF EDUCATIONAL ESTABLISHMENTS IN TERMS OF DEMOGRAPHIC AND GEOGRAPHICAL FACTORS.
USE FOR EVENTS BEFORE 1992.
RECOGNITION AND APPROVAL OF THE ACADEMIC STANDARDS OF AN EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION BY SOME EXTERNAL, IMPARTIAL BODY OF HIGH PUBLIC ESTEEM.
CERTIFICATES OF HIGHER EDUCATION WITH LESS WEIGHT THAN A DEGREE.

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: ASENTAMIENTOS HUMANOS Y USOS DEL SUELO

skos:Concept.skos:scopeNote: CULTURAL DIMENSION OF THE DEVELOPMENT PROCESS.
INSTITUTIONS OF HIGHER EDUCATION WITH LEGAL RIGHT TO CONFER DEGREES.
SITUATION IN WHICH A CIVILIZATION IS FUNDAMENTALLY CALLED INTO QUESTION.
REFERS TO THE CONTRIBUTION OF SCIENTIFIC AND SOCIAL SCIENCE INFORMATION TO THE DEVELOPMENT PROCESS.
ENROLMENT AS PERCENTAGE OF RELEVANT AGE GROUP.
CHANGES IN OBJECTIVES, CONTENT OR METHODS INITIATED, AS A RULE, IN EXPERIMENTAL SITUATIONS.
INCLUDES THE CODING AND DECODING OF MESSAGES.
USE FOR EVENTS AFTER 1991.

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: FORMATION DES PERSONNELS DE LA COMMUNICATION
INGENIERÍA CIVIL, MILITAR Y DE MINAS

skos:Concept.skos:scopeNote: -IBE USES: SOCIOLOGY OF EDUCATION-
EXTENSION ACTIVITY OF UNIVERSITIES ORGANIZING LOCAL SHORT OR PART TIME COURSES IN ACADEMIC SUBJECTS TO ADULTS OTHER THAN ITS STUDENTS, USUALLY AWAY FROM THE CAMPUS.
USE FOR EVENTS AFTER 1991.
USE ONLY WHEN REFERRING TO THEIR ORGANIZATION, FINANCING, ETC.
USE FOR EVENTS BETWEEN 1949 AND 1990.
EFFECTS OF THE ASSOCIATED PROBLEMS OF REPETITION AND DROPPING OUT.
INCLUDES SOLAR WIND, FLARES, PROMINENCES, SUNSPOTS.

ASSIGNMENT OF INDEX TERMS TO DOCUMENTS OR OBJECTS WITH THE AIM TO BE ABLE LATER ON TO RETRIEVE THE DOCUMENTS OR OBJECTS ACCORDING TO THE SELECTED CONCEPTS DESIGNATED BY THE INDEX TERMS -ESSENTIALLY, DESCRIPTORS-.
LENDING TO USERS THE DOCUMENTS REQUESTED.
skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: SERVICIO DE PRÉSTAMO DE LAS BIBLIOTECAS

skos:Concept.skos:scopeNote: USE ONLY WHEN INDEXING MATERIAL RELATING TO THE RECOMMENDATION ON TECHNICAL AND VOCATIONAL EDUCATION. OTHERWISE, USE MORE SPECIFIC DESCRIPTOR.
ORGANIZE THE SETTING AND MARKING OF EXAMINATIONS AND THE RECORDING OF RESULTS.
-IBE USES: GROUPING -INSTRUCTIONAL PURPOSES--
USE FOR CONSTRUCTION WORK OTHER THAN BUILDINGS.
EDUCATIONAL AND VOCATIONAL PROGRAMMES PROVIDED FOR ADULTS OR YOUTH IN PRISONS OR DETENTION CENTRES.
ARRANGEMENTS GIVING EDUCATIONAL ESTABLISHMENTS AT ANY LEVEL A DEGREE OF AUTONOMY IN ADMINISTRATIVE AND PROGRAMME MATTERS. -IBE USES: INSTITUTIONAL SELF MANAGEMENT-
ANY MATERIAL ASSISTANCE OR INTERCESSION BY THE INTERNATIONAL COMMUNITY IN TROUBLED AREAS FOR PURELY HUMANITARIAN ENDS.
INTEGRATION OF MORE THAN ONE MEDIUM IN A PRESENTATION OR MODULE OF INSTRUCTION.
THE USE OF THE VARIOUS FORMS OF PHYSICAL COMMUNICATIONS INFRASTRUCTURE AND THE MEDIA IN THE DEVELOPMENT PROCESS.
INCLUDES CALORIE, PROTEIN AND/OR VITAMIN DEFICIENCIES.

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: SISTEMA DE INFORMACIÓN PARA LA GESTIÓN

skos:Concept.skos:scopeNote: LITERATURE OF THE 20TH CENTURY.
ADAPTATIONS OF KNOWLEDGE FROM THE SOCIAL SCIENCES FOR TEACHING PURPOSES AT THE PRIMARY AND SECONDARY LEVELS OF EDUCATION.
INCOME OF AN INDIVIDUAL OR AN ORGANIZATION. OTHERWISE USE "NATIONAL INCOME".
DEGREE TO WHICH EDUCATIONAL SYSTEMS ARE SUCCESSFUL IN OPTIMIZING THE EDUCATIONAL INPUT/OUTPUT RELATIONSHIP.

AN INTERACTIVE SOCIAL PROCESS WHICH INVOLVES THE SHARING OF INFORMATION, EXPERIENCES, AND CULTURES, BOTH PHYSICALLY OR ELECTRONICALLY, AND RESULTS IN THE MUTUAL ENHANCEMENT OF ALL CONCERNED. USE MORE SPECIFIC DESCRIPTOR.
PART OF TIMETABLE WHERE STUDENTS DO PRACTICAL WORK IN LABORATORY OR WORKSHOP.

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: CAPACITACIÓN PARA LA PRODUCCIÓN DE LIBROS

skos:Concept.skos:scopeNote: 16TH-18TH CENTURY.
RESERVE FOR SCHOOL AND UNDERGRADUATE LEVELS OF EDUCATION.
AN ACTIVITY DESIGNED TO IDENTIFY, PREDICT, INTERPRET AND COMMUNICATE INFORMATION CONCERNING THE ENVIRONMENTAL CONSEQUENCES OF POLICIES, PROJECTS ETC.
THE THEORY OR SCIENCE OF THE METHOD OR GROUNDS OF KNOWLEDGE.
A PARTICULAR FORM OF RELIGIOUS WORSHIP; DEVOTION TO A PARTICULAR PERSON OR THING.
RESERVES CREATED TO ENSURE LONG-TERM SURVIVAL OF REPRESENTATIVE ECOSYSTEMS, WITH THEIR COMPONENT PLANTS AND ANIMALS.
POPULATION ACTIVITY IN TERMS OF DECLINE, INCREASE OR STABILIZATION.
AN ORIGINAL 'DOCUMENT' WHICH IS NOT THE RESULT OF A DOCUMENTATION PROCESS.
THE PROCESS WHEREBY LABOUR IS ALLOCATED TO THE ACTIVITY IN WHICH IT IS MOST PRODUCTIVE.
MAKING A RECORD OF KNOWLEDGE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC AS A PUBLICATION.

REFERS TO SPECIFIC TEACHING SKILLS OF INTERACTING WITH STUDENTS IN CLASSROOMS, BASED ON THE CLEAR DEFINITION OF THE KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND ATTITUDES TO BE ACQUIRED. -IBE USES: COMPETENCY-BASED EDUCATION-
PRODUCTION IN WHICH ALL CONTROLS ARE AUTOMATICALLY CARRIED OUT BY MACHINERY.
USE FOR EVENTS BEFORE 1991.
USE FOR EVENTS BEFORE 1991.
MEETINGS OF INDIVIDUALS WITH COMMON INTERESTS AND PROBLEMS, USUALLY WITH EXPERTS, TO EXCHANGE INFORMATION AND LEARN NEEDED SKILLS OR TECHNIQUES.
ADVISING PUPILS OR STUDENTS ON THEIR EDUCATIONAL PROGRESS, ON CAREER OPPORTUNITIES, OR PERSONAL ANXIETIES -E.G. DRUGS OR CONTRACEPTION-, OR ON SUDDEN CRISES IN THEIR LIVES.
REPRESENTATION OF AN EDUCATIONAL CONCEPT OR SYSTEM IN A TWO OR THREE- DIMENSIONAL DIAGRAM OR A MATHEMATICAL OR OTHER ANALOGOUS FORM.

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: SISTEMAS Y NIVELES DE LA EDUCACIÓN

skos:Concept.skos:scopeNote: THEORY AND APPLICATION OF EDUCATIONAL MEDIA IN A SYSTEMATIC WAY.
INCLUDES ORBITING SPACE STATIONS, LUNAR BASES, ETC.
REFERS TO THE INITIAL STAGE OF INDUSTRIAL DEVELOPMENT.
NONPRINT TEACHING MATERIALS AND THE EQUIPMENT REQUIRED FOR THEIR DISPLAY.
THE ECONOMICALLY ACTIVE POPULATION.
PROVIDES KNOWLEDGE ABOUT PRODUCTION PRINCIPLES AND PROCESSES AND PRACTICAL SKILLS NEEDED FOR PARTICIPATION IN PRODUCTIVE WORK. -IBE USES: POLYTECHNICAL EDUCATION-
USE MORE SPECIFIC DESCRIPTOR WHERE APPROPRIATE.
USE FOR EVENTS AFTER 31 DEC. 1999. OTHERWISE, USE MACAO.
GEOGRAPHICAL DISTRIBUTION OF ANIMALS AND PLANTS.
THE STORAGE AND PROCESSING OF ITEMS OF INFORMATION ESPECIALLY BY COMPUTER.
-1- IN GENERAL USAGE, RECORDS ACCUMULATED BY GOVERNMENT AGENCIES. -2- RECORDS OPEN TO PUBLIC INSPECTION BY LAW OR CUSTOM.
UNDERUTILIZATION OR INEFFICIENT USE OF THE LABOUR FORCE.
USE FOR WORKS DEALING WITH RESEARCH PROJECTS. FOR GENERAL SCIENTIFIC WORKS, USE "BIOLOGY".
PHENOMENA WHICH RESULT WHEN GROUPS OF INDIVIDUALS OF DIFFERENT CULTURES COME INTO CONTINUOUS CONTACT, WITH SUBSEQUENT CHANGES IN THE ORIGINAL CULTURAL PATTERNS OF EITHER OR BOTH GROUPS.
SOCIAL ANTHROPOLOGICAL INTERPRETATION OF ARCHAEOLOGICAL REMAINS.
USE FOR WORKS DEALING WITH RESEARCH PROJECTS. FOR GENERAL SCIENTIFIC WORKS, USE "HYDROLOGY".
FOR DEPRIVED OR DISADVANTAGED STUDENTS.
FOR MORE SPECIFIC DESCRIPTORS, SEE "OCCUPATIONS" AND "PERSONNEL".
WITHIN A COUNTRY.
SCHOOLING PROVIDED EITHER AS AN ALTERNATIVE TO FORMAL EDUCATION OR FOR HOMEBOUND PERSONS.-ILO USES: HOME INSTRUCTION-
AWARD TO CONTINUE STUDIES TO AN ADVANCED LEVEL.
AN ARTIFICIAL LANGUAGE USED BY DOCUMENTATION SYSTEMS FOR PURPOSES OF INDEXING.

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: ÉDUCATION POUR LA PRÉVENTION DU SIDA
EDUCACIÓN PARA LA PREVENCIÓN DEL SIDA

skos:Concept.skos:scopeNote: THE PHYSICAL, SOCIAL AND MANAGERIAL FACTORS AFFECTING A WORKER'S JOB ENVIRONMENT.
EFFECTS OF ELECTRICITY, CHEMICALS, HEAT, PRESSURE, ETC. ON THE HUMAN BODY.
USE MORE SPECIFIC DESCRIPTOR WHERE APPROPRIATE.

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: REFORMA DE TENENCIA DE LA TIERRA

skos:Concept.skos:scopeNote: USE FOR EVENTS BETWEEN 1918 AND 1991.
-IBE USES: TEACHERS COLLEGES-
USE MORE SPECIFIC DESCRIPTOR WHERE APPROPRIATE.
USE ONLY WITH RESPECT TO POPULATION OF A SPECIFIC COUNTRY OR REGION; OTHERWISE, USE MORE SPECIFIC DESCRIPTOR WHERE APPROPRIATE.
COMPUTER SYSTEM BASED ON A DATA BASE CREATED BY HUMAN AUTHORITIES ON A PARTICULAR SUBJECT.
USE MORE SPECIFIC DESCRIPTOR WHERE APPROPRIATE.
STUDY CARRIED OUT WITH A MINIMUM OR A COMPLETE ABSENCE OF EXTERNAL GUIDANCE. DO NOT CONFUSE WITH "INDIVIDUALIZED INSTRUCTION".
OFFICIAL STATEMENTS OF GOALS TO WHICH THE SYSTEM OF EDUCATION IS DIRECTED.
APPROPRIATE SMALL-SCALE FINANCIAL SUPPORT FOR POVERTY ALLEVIATION.
THE STUDY OF THE OCCURENCE, MOVEMENT AND CHANGES IN THE STATE OF WATER IN THE ATMOSPHERE.
THE CONTINUOUS AND SYSTEMATIC PROCESSING OF DOCUMENTS OR DATA FOR SPECIALIZED INFORMATION USERS.
USE FOR EVENTS BEFORE 1991.
USE WITH RESPECT TO A COUNTRY'S EXTERNAL PUBLIC DEBT.
AID FROM THE VIEWPOINT OF THE DONOR COUNTRY.
DEVELOPMENTAL CHANGE OF ONE OR MORE CHARACTERISTICS OF THE EDUCATIONAL SYSTEM VARIABLES IN A POSITIVE DIRECTION IN TERMS OF SOME VALUED CRITERION. USE MORE SPECIFIC DESCRIPTOR WHERE APPROPRIATE.
BIOLOGICAL EFFECTS OF RADIATION.
DESIGNED TO IMPROVE CROPS, INCREASE YIELDS, DEVELOP RESISTANCES TO DISEASES.
LIBERTY OF EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS TO DECIDE COURSES AND RESEARCH, AND OF TEACHERS TO TEACH SUBJECTS, WITHOUT OUTSIDE COERCION.
DETAILED EXAMINATION OF THE MANNER IN WHICH A PARTICULAR JOB IS PERFORMED, WITH A VIEW TO RATIONALIZING PERFORMANCE AND INCREASING PRODUCTIVITY.
USED FOR PURCHASING PUBLICATIONS AND AUDIOVISUAL MATERIALS INTENDED FOR EDUCATIONAL, SCIENTIFIC, AND CULTURAL PURPOSES.
THE OFFERING OF LEARNING OPPORTUNITIES IN PROFESSIONAL AND VOCATIONAL DEVELOPMENT, PERSONAL DEVELOPMENT, AND SOCIAL DEVELOPMENT TO ADULTS.
INCLUDES TECHNOLOGY FOR DATA BASE MANAGEMENT SYSTEMS, AS WELL AS FOR INFORMATION DISTRIBUTION, SUCH AS TELEPROCESSING SYSTEMS, NETWORKS OF TERMINALS, VIDEOTEX SYSTEMS, MICROGRAPHY, ETC.
INDOOR OR OUTDOOR AREAS THAT OFFER A VARIETY OF RESOURCES -E.G. SUPPLIES, POSSIBLE.
ORGANIZATION OF THE CURRICULUM OR OF INSTRUCTIONAL COURSES IN SELF- CONTAINED UNITS -'MODULES'- DESIGNED FOR MANAGEMENT BY THE LEARNER. -IBE USES: MODULAR TRAINING-
THE SKILLS, KNOWLEDGE, HARDWARE, AND PROCEDURES FOR PROVIDING USEFUL GOODS AND SERVICES.
A WORD, TERM OR A PHRASE CHOSEN TO EXPRESS A CONCEPT OR A CONCEPT COMBINATION IN INDEXING AND TO CONSTITUTE AN ENTRY.
RELATIONS AT BOTH THE INTERNATIONAL AND INTERGROUP LEVEL. USE MORE SPECIFIC DESCRIPTOR WHERE APPROPRIATE.
USE MORE SPECIFIC DESCRIPTOR.
USE FOR THE STUDY OF MAN OR OTHER EARTH LIFE IN OUTER SPACE.
CLASSIFICATION OF THE SPECIES OF ANIMALS.
SOCIAL AND CULTURAL FUNCTIONS OF LANGUAGE.
OBSERVATION OF STUDENT BEHAVIOUR IN RESPONSE TO VARIOUS TEACHING ATTITUDES. -IBE USES: INTERACTION PROCESS-
PERIODIC PROFESSIONAL RENEWAL, DISTINCT FROM MORE GENERAL CONCEPT OF LIFELONG EDUCATION.
IN THE FIELD OF COMMUNICATION.
INTERNATIONAL STANDARD SERIAL NUMBER.
RELATES TO THE PROBLEM. PROVISION FOR RESOLVING IT SHOULD BE HANDLED BY THE "LITERACY" DESCRIPTORS.
STUDENTS ENGAGED IN STUDIES LEADING TO A FIRST DEGREE, E.G. BACHELOR'S DEGREE.
REFERS TO TIMBER EXTRACTION AND REFORESTATION ASPECTS OF FORESTRY.
A SERVICE WHICH CONTINUALLY DISSEMINATES DOCUMENTS, REFERENCES, "ABSTRACTS" OR DATA SELECTED ACCORDING TO THE INTEREST PROFILES OF THE USERS.
THE PROCESS OF LEARNING WHICH GOES ON CONTINUOUSLY AND INCIDENTALLY FOR EACH INDIVIDUAL, OUTSIDE THE ORGANIZED SITUATION OF FORMAL OR NONFORMAL EDUCATION. DO NOT CONFUSE WITH "NONFORMAL EDUCATION".
THE COMPUTER'S CENTRAL PROCESSING UNIT.

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: FORMACIÓN DE DOCENTES DE EDUCACIÓN ESPECIAL

skos:Concept.skos:scopeNote: USE MORE SPECIFIC DESCRIPTOR WHERE APPROPRIATE.
USE MORE SPECIFIC DESCRIPTOR.
REFERS TO THE INTEGRATION OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY INTO THE DEVELOPMENT PROCESS.
ACTIVITIES OF INTERNATIONAL ORGANIZATIONS IN THE POPULATION FIELD.
